channel.title: ---Updates Invision's Storyline prt1N2 ----
channel.description:
Hi guyz im working on this project awell ago :P Its a storyline of a boys quest in looking for her mother and takes challenges on the say :) PLz comment :P
Features: No teleports expert from npc or teleing home legit systems Npc around the map giving you challenges No shops (npc rewards) Training on the way to success Bosses ------------------------------------------- Pics: [IMG]http://i839.photobucket.com/albums/zz319/omgitzdanny/1-4-20129-21-13PM.png[/img]

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:43, topic:428141”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=530829.msg3879083#msg3879083 date=1325886696]
You should make them a child, by editing their height and width client side(I released how to do it) and let them play as a kid for a little while, then grow into an adult later on.
[/quote]

That’s what I suggested as well, I thought it’d be great. He’s decided to quit though.[/quote]

Lol, lame. I think it would be kinda easy to do.

Read full topic

item.title: ---Updates Invision's Storyline prt1N2 ----
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:23, topic:428141”]You need to fix this ‘boy’ thing, who knows maybe a girl might want to play it at one point. Try be like:
‘(person’sname)? Is that you?’
Then from there have an option to start it like
‘Yes, who are you?’
or
‘No, who are you?’
Then from there actualy give a little insight to whats going on, try not to make the steps so obvious though. ‘Until you find a book’, it isn’t great telling someone what they have to do all the time so just try and let them figure it out. So isntead:
‘A (beast’s name) has stolen the Book of Memories from the book shelf in my room, woud you mind retreving it for me?’
Then have more options like:
‘If i get this book will you tell me about my mother?’
or
‘How will this book help me, i’m not going to get a stupid book for you!’
You know have an open kinda option thing to make it seem like they have a choice. That’s my opinion though, your project.[/quote]

This is a good point, you should make it less linear.

Read full topic
